definition:
Of, pertaining to, or designating, or derived from, a muscat grapes or similar grapes; a muscatel grapes; muscatel wine, etc.

1. A common name for several varieties of rich sweet wine, made in Italy, Spain, and France. 2. pl.  Finest raisins, dried on the vine; "sun raisins." [Variously written moscatel, muscadel, etc.]
